concept.title: Location of indexterm elements
concept.shortdesc: indexterm elements can occur in topic bodies, topic prologs, and DITA maps.

conbody.p: The location of the indexterm element has an effect on where the indexterm points to and thus the page references that are rendered in the generated index.

dlentry.dd: An indexterm element that is located in a topic (and not the topic prolog) is a point reference to the location where the indexterm element occurs.
An indexterm element that is located in a topic prolog or as a child of a topicref element is a point reference to the title of the topic.
